description: Lists all tags on an AWS IoT Things Graph resource.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource whose tags are to be returned.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: List of tags returned by the ListTagsForResource operation.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token that specifies the next page of results to return.
